segments.text: I feel a wave of disbelief as I watch the boy stretch towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance is precarious, and I canâ€™t help but wonder how he got this idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is eagerly reaching out, hoping for a cookie, her excitement is infectious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I feel a knot of anxiety tightening in my stomach; he could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to pour relentlessly from the sink, creating an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a ticking time bomb waiting to detonate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every second that passes increases the chances of an accident happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
